description: Hisako is second-in-command of http://anidb.net/ch15363 [Girls Dead Monster] who plays a Fender Jazzmaster electric guitar as lead guitarist. She has a candid personality and likes to play mahjong, which she has incredible luck with. As noted by http://anidb.net/ch15355 [Hinata], Hisako is also athletic and is greatly admired by http://anidb.net/ch15118 [Yui] for her guitar riffs.
name: Hisako
